misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a formidable presence on the fairways, brings a unique blend of power and precision to every round. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Jussi is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, having participated in three previous tournaments.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy remain elusive achievements for him thus far, Jussi's dedication and strategic approach make him a compelling player to watch. Known for his signature power draw, Jussi can shape the ball in a way few others can.

Even though Jussi is not expected to be in the field for the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts recognize that the world of competitive golf can be full of surprises, and changes to the field are always possible.
